p: NE formulations with a high SAA concentration are unfavorable since this may result in in vivo irritation and also decreases the thermodynamic activity of the drug in the vehicle, which may affect release of the drug from the applied dosage form [ 41]. Therefore, NE formulation systems capable of attaining enhanced entropy and significantly lower oil/water interfacial free energy with the minimum S mix were considered to be thermodynamically stable and were selected for further study.
